00001 <?php
00002 /**
00003  * create some shortcut-defines for often-needed strings. after this you can include boot.php
00004  * @package kata_internal
00005  */
00006 
00007 
00008 
00009 
00010 
00011 if (!defined('DS')) {
00012 /**
00013  * shortcut for / or \ (depending on OS)
00014  */
00015     define('DS', DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR);
00016 }
00017 if (!defined('ROOT')) {
00018     /**
00019      * absolute filesystem path to the root directory of this framework
00020      */
00021     define('ROOT',dirname(dirname(__FILE__)).DS);
00022 }
00023 if (!defined('WWW_ROOT')) {
00024     /**
00025      * absolute filesystem path to the webroot-directory of this framework
00026      */
00027     define('WWW_ROOT', ROOT.'webroot'. DS);
00028 }
00029 if (!defined('LIB')) {
00030     /**
00031      * absolute filesystem path to the lib-directory of this framework
00032      */
00033     define('LIB',ROOT.'lib'.DS);
00034 }
00035 
00036 /**
00037  * @ignore
00038  */
00039 if (php_sapi_name() == 'cli') {
00040     define('CLI',1);
00041 } else {
00042     define('CLI',0);
00043 }

00046 /**
00047  * our error-level constants
00048  */
00049 define('KATA_DEBUG', 2);
00050 define('KATA_ERROR', 1);
00051 define('KATA_PANIC', 0);
00052 
00053 /**
00054  * some often used constants that should be part of PHP
00055  */
00056 define('SECOND', 1);
00057 define('MINUTE', 60 * SECOND);
00058 define('HOUR', 60 * MINUTE);
00059 define('DAY', 24 * HOUR);
00060 define('WEEK', 7 * DAY);
00061 define('MONTH', 30 * DAY);
00062 define('YEAR', 365 * DAY);
